generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: friendly, casual

Audience: frequent travellers
generations.text: Looking to learn a new language before your next trip? Look no further than LangLang! Our app connects you with teachers from all over the world, so you can learn in a fun, casual setting.

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: friendly, casual

Audience: frequent travellers
generations.text: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world. Teacher can remotely access teaching resources, chat, and share lessons with one another. Whether you're travelling for business or pleasure, LangLang has the perfect app for you!

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: friendly, casual

Audience: frequent travellers
generations.text: If you're looking for an easy way to find local language teachers in your area, LangLang is the perfect app for you! With our simple user interface, you can find language classes and teachers near you in minutes. Plus, our user-friendly search tool lets you find the right teacher for your needs, whether you're looking for a one-time lesson or a regular relationship.
